enWisdom: How bad a disposition opinionatedness [and arbitrariness] is!

Wisdom: لِلَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ حُكْمٌ بَيِّنٌ فِي الْمُسْتَأْثِرِ وَالْجَازِعِ
enWisdom: With Allah, the Glorified, lies the clear verdict between the appropriator [Uthm?n] and the protestor [who was responsible for his assassination]
One who gains authority [usually] adopts partiality
One who is content with his [own] opinion is indeed doomed
One who is opinionated [and headstrong] slips

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَبَدَّ بِرَأْيِهِ خَفَّتْ وَطْأَتُهُ عَلَى أَعْدَائِهِ
enWisdom: When one is opinionated, it becomes easy for his enemies to defeat him
One who is opinionated has endangered and imperilled [himself]
